a.n: Bartók - Concerto for Orchestra - I. Introduzione

p.k: Pierre Boulez conducts the Berlin Philharmonic in a performance of Bartók's Concerto for Orchestra (Part 1)
p.d: Pierre Boulez conducts the Berlin Philharmonic in a performance of Bartók's Concerto for Orchestra (Part 1) from the Hieronymites Monastery in Lisbon in 2003
